description: Detects service installation of different remote access tools software. These software are often abused by threat actors to perform
author: Connor Martin
Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Remote Access Tool Services Have Been Installed - Security
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4697" AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:(*SSUService* OR *SplashtopRemoteService* OR *Atera* OR *LogMeIn* OR *LMIGuardianSvc* OR *TeamViewer* OR *RPCService* OR *RPCPerformanceService* OR *BASupportExpressStandaloneService* OR *BASupportExpressSrvcUpdater* OR *GoToMyPC* OR *monblanking* OR *RManService* OR *GoToAssist* OR *AmmyyAdmin* OR *vncserver* OR *Parsec* OR *chromoting* OR *Zoho* OR *jumpcloud*))
